all_text_timv: RTNDA commun. RTNDA communicator RTNDA communicator / Radio Television News Directors Association. Issues for <Mar. 1978-> have title: Radio Television News Directors Association communicator Communicator Washington, D.C. : Radio Television News Directors Association 18 v. : ill. ; 28 cm. Monthly Began with [vol. 25, no.1] (Jan. 1971).  Ceased with vol. 42, no. 7 (July 1988). Vols. <33>-42 (<1979>-1988) include a directory of RTNDA members. Issues for Jan.-Mar. 1971 called vol. 1, no. 1-3 but constitute vol. 25, no. 1-3.  Numerous other errors in numbering. Description based on: [Vol. 25, no. 1] (Jan. 1978); title from caption. Latest issue consulted: Vol. 42, no. 7 (July 1988). Broadcast journalism Periodicals. Broadcast journalism. fast (OCoLC)fst00839167 Periodicals. fast (OCoLC)fst01411641 Radio-Television News Directors Association.
